div.head: 陽毒結胸
div.div: bound chest because of yang poison

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: bound chest because of yang poison

sense.def: Pathological Condition of jie xiong 結胸 , bound [qi in the] chest, brought forth by an exuberant presence of yang poison. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qiu jin 蚯蚓 quotes SHYY :陽毒結胸，按 之極痛，或通而復結，喘促，大躁狂亂 , “ Bound chest because of yang poison : if pressed the pain is extreme. In some cases the [chest] opens and then is bound again. [Patients] pant hectically; they are restless and exhibit madness with confusion”.
